p: The caffeine beverages like green and black tea from Camellia sinensis have bioflavonoids with several medicinal properties. A study reported that water soluble tannic acid and theaflavin-3, 3สน-digallate inhibit 3CL pro protease of SARS-CoV ( Chen et al., 2005). Similarly, the phytocompounds namely hesperetin, sinigrin, beta-sitosterol, indigo and aloe emodin extracted from Isatis indigotica were found to have an inhibitory effect on the SARS-CoV 3CL pro ( Lin et al., 2005).
